website_summaries.verdict: A good balance of value and quality. This chair is not as expensive as many of the others, but it is a good basic workhorse for anyone who needs a dependable option for all of their massaging appointments and workshops.
pros: The ultralight 18-pound frame makes the Bedford portable massage chair one of the lightest on the market
You'll have no trouble transporting it to and from your massage appointments
cons: The knee supports can be weak under the strain of someone putting their weight down while getting up from the chair

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship and horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: Poor packing, horrible plastic smell which took more than 2 weeks to go away, head rest does not stick. The only good thing is I found a different use for it, I use it as a chair by sitting on it and my back is against where the chest is supposed to go and I can work on the computer without my low back pain🤗, hence did not return it. As a massage chair I would not get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry13

customer_reviews.title: I would invest in something better next
customer_reviews.text: Got it for last minute chair massage event. The face cradle kept making a clicking sound when client would put their face in. I would invest in something better next time
customer_reviews.author: Lorena lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not too pleased
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and the head rest was not well glued on and it keeps unglueing , the velcro is not staying on the head rest so the face cradle keeps falling off. Also if you are short, like 5 l2 or 53 this chair is high and it is difficult to work on larger clients, I am disapointed to be honest. and I use it almost every day. Not best choice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh... I should have spent the extra money on a better chair.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product at first but 8 months after using it, the head adjustment knob seems to be stuck in one position and I am not able to adjust the height. I've tried wabbling the rod to remove the knob. Tried wiggling the knob to unstuck the screw that will not move. Nothing works. Saddens me that this has happened and I hope to invest in a better massage chair in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Doheny

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. The description says it's good for students. I am way past student and I think the chair is more than adequate. It comfortable, easily adjustable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: tricia drake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of confusing to remember how to open it each time but the chair works great
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Not stable
customer_reviews.text: I just had my mother sit on the chair and it fell backwards. She weighs 350 lbs. I thought this was supposed to support up to 500 lbs? She just hurt herself from falling. When I sit in it, I am fine. I don't see any way to adjust this chair so my mother won't get hurt on it. Disappointed. This was bought, put in storage and just opened the box. Now I can't even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Danna

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great quality at a very affordable price. Needed one of these chairs for my mothers recovery for her eye surgery and this thing rocked! The price was less than half of what a medical rental company wanted! Easy to set up and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly seat!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this chair because I felt it wasn't safe. When seated on the chair, the seat wobbled side to side. I don't dare risk a client being injured!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose. Zipper on bag doesn't work, using bag from previous chair.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeischa

customer_reviews.title: Instantly broke
customer_reviews.text: Never even got to use this. It broke when putting the head piece on.
customer_reviews.author: tfos42

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don't personally like this chair. The chest cushion is too small, all cushions are hard and uncomfortable, it's not very sturdy, and I've used it twice and the glue holding the face cradle to the velcro is already coming apart. It will do the job but I have since bought a different chair to bring to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this chair for 5 hours and it has held up even with plus size humans.

customer_reviews.title: The head rest and chest piece does not lock in ...
customer_reviews.text: The head rest and chest piece does not lock in. I have to use the weight of the client to hold the two pieces in place.
customer_reviews.author: David Wayne Root

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome chair, it’s comfortable and easy to set up and break down
customer_reviews.author: Ray Sauls

customer_reviews.title: Sad😢
customer_reviews.text: The headrest broke after I adjusted it a few times. My clients were scared the chair was breaking on them. It makes a lot of cracking noises
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: The carrying case is crap. Not happy
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the same chair that is in the picture. That glossy look isint there , it’s matte black. The carrying case is crap. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light, stable, easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Over the handful of uses it has seen so far, this product has been exactly what we were looking for, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Chris.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived promptly and as described in the ad. It was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Kindermann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair, easy to set up and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer saves a nickel on the plywood seat and renders the whole chair unusable!
customer_reviews.text: The seat is made out of super thin 3/16" plywood. The first time my 130 pound wife sat on it, it snapped. I returned the massage chair.
customer_reviews.author: H. V.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and quick service
customer_reviews.text: 1. Great product. We chose it for the brand reputation but could not get the higher quality model for next day delivery. We were very pleased with performance, ease of use and durability. 2. Next day delivery was such a life saver. We needed it in a pinch and we got just in time for a promo event we attended to drum up business. Would recommend this item and especially if your trying to decide between this model and the higher end, this works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great massage chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: I found this chair to be well built and a great value for the money. It is easy to adjust and comfortable for those using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had this chair for 5 months, barely used it and it’s almost done... it’s not light for me, I’m a 5’2” female massage therapist, the steel frame doesn’t seat on the floor properly, the upholstery is ripping already...and the bolt that secures the face cradle in position doesn’t hold anymore :/ looking to see if there is any warranty on this product
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Toro

customer_reviews.title: The price is right, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged, does not feel very sturdy. Had an issue with the headrest staying in place on the first use. I returned this item and got a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and in good condition. A few minor issues
customer_reviews.text: I have used chair only 1 day so far but for 9 chair massages. Arrived on time and in good condition. A few minor issues, Bag already has a hole in it, and instructions for a table instead of chair and no other papers were included. When I wipe with sanitizing wipe the red comes off on wipe still after 10 times but chair doesn't look discolored so watch out for clients clothing. For price, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: breezy

customer_reviews.title: It was not comfortable for him
customer_reviews.text: No it did not. It was for my father whom is a little heavy and older. It was not comfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: David Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job :)
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I was a little apprehensive about purchasing this chair after reading the reviews but after using it on three jobs, I can say it is a sturdy chair that adjusts easily. It is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Beantown Babe

customer_reviews.title: A terrible product, does not live up to the sellers description.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product so I would have a dependable lightweight chair to travel with. This chair is very poor quality. Fits only SMALL, Slender, lightweight people. 5' 6" or smaller ONLY !!! It was not advertised this way. I attempted to use this 4 times, and was completely embarrassed. The head section does not take any weight at all, and keeps falling. As you can imagine very disruptive to a treatment. This is one of those times when you get what you pay for. Its a bargain alright, and a poor one at that. All around, totally disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Aziza Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Poor qualitub
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality - you get exactly what you pay for here - need more adjustment, and if you are shorter than 5’5” or taller than 5’10” you will not interest NOT find a comfy position If you want a cheap chair buy it but if you want some longevity and a product you can use walk awayb
customer_reviews.author: tomy

customer_reviews.title: I am glad with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am glad with my purchase. Doubt at the beginning for previous reviews. However, The chair is strong and is ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good chair.
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this chair lightly for the past couple of months, but it appears to be of good quality, it is very comfortable, and most importantly it is EASILY adjustable which is hugely important for any professional!
customer_reviews.author: Sonn

customer_reviews.title: I wish this product was little cheaper
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of smaller than I thought but it was comfortable and held me okay except for the head part was not holding me well.
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and relaxing. Its easy to adjust and work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Master Massage Bedford Portable Light Weight Massage Chair with Carrying Case
product_meta.description: Master Massage specially constructed the Bedford Portable Massage Chair for students and professionals who need to transition between the office, mall or clients' houses. While the chair is so light it can easily be transported from site to site, it's sturdy enough to support a working weight up to 500lbs., thanks to its innovative aircraft-grade steel frame. The chair is cushioned with Master Massage's exclusive Multi-Layer Small Cell foam, which is engineered to be more dense than any other foam available, and therefore more comfortable for clients. The Brown Luster PU upholstery is oil- and water-resistant, and backed by a Master Massage 2 Year Guarantee. Additionally, the frame is electrostatically powder coated to prevent rust, nicks, and scratches, to keep the Bedford looking band new for years. The Bedford package comes with a six-way adjustable face cradle, a Max Comfort foam layered pillow and a free carrying case. Folds Compactly - for easy mobility and storage!
feature_bullets: 11" width x 14" length x 39" height, chair itself only weighs 18lbs; the working capacity is 500lbs
Exclusive Multi-Layer Small Cell Foam ( Higher Density than normal foam), Oil & Waterproof, CFC-free
PU Upholstery in Burgundy- with denim-like reinforcement backing for Extra Durability; It features our Six-Way Adjustable Face Cradle with Memory Foam layered pillow
Our Exclusive Multi-Layer Small Cell Foam Cushioning System to ensure your clients a luxuriously comfortable therapeutic massage experience
Aircraft Steel Frame- Lightweight and Tremendously Strong, No-Mark Finished Frame- Electrostatically Powder Coated to prevent rust, nicks, and scratches

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
